Package app.server.tools

Class DownloadRequestsBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.server.tools.DownloadRequestsBuffer
  • public class DownloadRequestsBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a buffer of download requests in order to set up a MAX_DOWN downloads for the server requests. It also manages waiting clients by its download size.
    Version:
    2020/01/01
    Author:
    Grupo 19
